original_text:
Fortune of Camelot
Per molti si tratta solo di leggende, per altri Re Artù è stato un condottiero esistito realmente. Quale sia la verità, rimane che le vicende narrate nel ciclo arturiano siano da molti considerate come le dirette antenate del genere fantasy. E non potrebbe essere altrimenti, visto che Re Artù viveva a Camelot, una fortezza che si trovava in un regno metà rete e metà incantato, popolato da creature magiche, maghi, incantesimi e armi prodigiose.
Con queste premesse, è quasi d’obbligo aspettarsi un grande lavoro a livello grafico e infatti la Jelly da questo punto di vista non delude affatto.
Neanche il tempo di far partire il gioco, che veniamo catapultati nel regno di Camelot, con una griglia di gioco incastrata nella pietra e due sculture di draghi scolpiti sui lati. Delle luci colorate si sollevano dal terreno, mentre sullo sfondo, sfocato, si intravedono le mura del castello. I tasti per giocare e per calibrare la scommessa si trovano a desta e a sinistra rispetto ai rulli. la musica che accompagna gli Spin ha un tono epico e coinvolgente.
La funzione Super Stake per ottenere i giri gratuiti
In Fortune of Camelot ci troviamo davanti a una griglia dal taglio classico, con 5 rulli e 3 righe. Le linee di pagamento sono 20, fisse, e su ognuna di esse è possibile puntare 0,01 €, dunque ogni Spin costerà appena 0,20 €. I giri automatici ci tolgono dall’incombenza di dover cliccare ogni volta il tasto Play. Dalla stessa pagina è possibile attivare la funzione Turbo Spin che permette di accelerare la rotazione dei rulli. C’è poi la possibilità di raddoppiare la possibilità di ottenere simboli Scatter, indispensabili per ricevere Free Spins. In tal caso sarà necessario acquistare la funzione Super Stake cliccando sul pulsante apposito.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) si attesta sul 95,84%, la volatilità è invece alta.
Bonus ricchi di magia
In Fortune of Camelot i simboli possono essere divisi tra quelli di basso livello, rappresentati dalle carte da gioco buone per una scala reale, e quelli di alto livello, ossia i personaggi della tavola rotonda, Artù, Ginevra, Lancillotto, Goffredo e Merlino.
La spada è il nostro Wild e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, rappresentato dalla scritta Bonus. Un minimo di tre Scatter ci regala dieci Free Spins. Durante il gioco bonus, ogni volta che un Wild atterrerà sui rulli il moltiplicatore posto sulla sinistra aumenterà di x1. Inoltre, è possibile che si attivi la magia di Merlino, uno speciale modificatore che può trasformare un Wild in Wild impilato o far apparire singoli Wild.
 
Domande Frequenti 
Posso giocare a Fortune of Camelot dallo smartphone?

Certamente, infatti questo slot è fruibile da qualsiasi dispositivo mobile o da pc.



Qual è il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Fortune of Camelot?

L’ RTP di questa slot è del 95,84%.



Posso acquistare i Free Spins?

No, ma si può usufruire della funzione Stake Logic che raddoppia la possibilità di ottenere i Free Spins.

raw_translation.response:
Review of "Fortune of Camelot"

For some, it's just a legend, while for others, King Arthur was a real leader. Whatever the truth may be, the events described in the Arthurian cycle are considered by many as the direct ancestors of the fantasy genre. And it couldn't be otherwise, since King Arthur lived in Camelot, a fortress located in a kingdom half network and half enchanted, populated by magical creatures, wizards, spells and miraculous weapons.

Given these premises, it's almost mandatory to expect a great graphic work and indeed Jelly doesn't disappoint at all. As soon as the game starts, we are catapulted into the kingdom of Camelot, with a game grid set in stone and two dragon sculptures carved on the sides. Colored lights rise from the ground, while in the background, blurred, the walls of the castle can be glimpsed. The buttons to play and calibrate the bet are to the right and left of the reels. The music that accompanies the Spin has an epic and engaging tone.

In Fortune of Camelot we have a classic cut grid, with 5 reels and 3 rows. The paylines are 20, fixed, and on each of them it's possible to bet 0.01 €, so each Spin will cost only 0.20 €. The automatic spins take away the burden of having to click the Play button each time. From the same page, it's possible to activate the Turbo Spin function, which allows to accelerate the rotation of the reels. There's also the possibility to double the chance of getting Scatter symbols, essential to receive Free Spins. In that case, it will be necessary to purchase the Super Stake function by clicking on the appropriate button.

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is set at 95.84%, the volatility is high.

In Fortune of Camelot, the symbols can be divided between those of low level, represented by playing cards good for a royal flush, and those of high level, namely the characters of the Round Table, Arthur, Guinevere, Lancelot, Geoffrey and Merlin.

The sword is our Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the word Bonus. A minimum of three Scatters gives us ten Free Spins. During the bonus game, every time a Wild lands on the reels, the multiplier on the left increases by x1. Furthermore, it's possible that Merlin's magic will be activated, a special modifier that can transform a Wild into a stacked Wild or make single Wilds appear.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Can I play Fortune of Camelot from my smartphone?

Certainly, this slot is available on any mobile device or PC.

What is the theoretical return to player of Fortune of Camelot?

The RTP of this slot is 95.84%.

Can I buy Free Spins?

No, but you can take advantage of the Stake Logic function that doubles the chance of getting Free Spins.

Review: Translation with style transfer:

Fortune of Camelot

For many, it's just a legend, but for others King Arthur was a real leader. Whatever the truth is, the events narrated in the Arthurian cycle are considered by many to be the direct ancestors of the fantasy genre. And it couldn't be otherwise, since King Arthur lived in Camelot, a fortress that was located in a kingdom half networked and half enchanted, populated by magical creatures, wizards, spells and miraculous weapons.

With these premises, it's almost mandatory to expect a great job at the graphics level and indeed Jelly doesn't disappoint at all in this regard. As soon as you start the game, you're catapulted into the realm of Camelot, with a game grid embedded in the stone and two sculptures of dragons carved on the sides. Colored lights rise from the ground, while in the background, blurred, you can glimpse the walls of the castle. The buttons to play and adjust the bet are located to the right and left of the reels. The music accompanying the spins has an epic and engaging tone.

The Super Stake function to get free spins

In Fortune of Camelot we find ourselves facing a classic-cut grid, with 5 reels and 3 rows. The paylines are 20, fixed, and on each of them it's possible to bet €0.01, so each spin will cost only €0.20. The automatic spins take us out of the burden of having to click the play button every time. From the same page, it's possible to activate the Turbo Spin function which allows you to accelerate the rotation of the reels. There's also the possibility to double the chance of getting Scatter symbols, essential to receive Free Spins. In this case, it will be necessary to purchase the Super Stake function by clicking on the appropriate button.

The theoretical return to the player (RTP) is set at 95.84%, while the volatility is high.

Magic-rich bonuses

In Fortune of Camelot the symbols can be divided between low-level ones, represented by playing cards good for a royal flush, and high-level ones, namely the characters of the Round Table, Arthur, Guinevere, Lancelot, Geoffrey and Merlin.

The sword is our Wild and substitutes for all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the Bonus sign. A minimum of three scatters gives us ten Free Spins. During the bonus game, every time a Wild lands on the reels, the multiplier on the left increases by x1. Moreover, it's possible that Merlin's magic, a special modifier that can transform a Wild into a stacked Wild or make single Wilds appear, will be activated.

Certainly, in fact this slot is available on any mobile device or pc.

The RTP of this slot is 95.84%.

No, but you can use the Stake Logic function that doubles the chance of getting Free Spins.

With these premises, it's almost mandatory to expect a great job at the graphics level and indeed Jelly doesn't disappoint at all in this regard. The theoretical return to the player (RTP) is set at 95.84%, while the volatility is high.

In Fortune of Camelot the symbols can be divided between low-level ones, represented by playing cards good for a royal flush, and high-level ones, namely the characters of the Round Table, Arthur, Guinevere, Lancelot, Geoffrey and Merlin.

The sword is our Wild and substitutes for all symbols except the Scatter, represented by the Bonus sign. A minimum of three scatters gives us ten Free Spins. During the bonus game, every time a Wild lands on the reels, the multiplier on the left increases by x1. Moreover, it's possible that Merlin's magic, a special modifier that can transform a Wild into a stacked Wild or make single Wilds appear, will be activated.
